title: I don’t know what to play
body:
I’ve been researching for days about good champions but none appeal. I want someone who can do damage, survive, have good laning and can team fight. I’ve spent about $40 - $50 on the game just for heroes. I don’t know who to play because I feel I can’t do anything. Wukong, Talon and Vi my mains feel boring and I now always die and have lost almost all of my games since this happened please help.
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body:
Xin Zhao has good damage and lifesteal.
Zed deals a lot of damage, especially his ult.
Riven deals damage and has bursts, and her ult not only deals a lot of damage, it also cause her autoattacks to deal bonus damage for a period of time.
Nasus deals damage by building stacks from his Q, if you managed to use his Q to kill a target your damage multiplies.
Illaoi or Darius , they are juggernauts therfore are tanky and have alot of damage and both have really good turn around potential in many cases you may kill the jungler and the laner when they gank
I’ve heard they’re good but would Shen or Ornn be good? Tbh I’m looking to becoming either a Top Support or Top ADC
Ornn Is really good he can build tank and still do crazy damage and shen is currently much better as a support
So pretty much you want someone who is tanky, does a ton of damage, is a massive lane bully, and can tear apart the enemy team in teamfights?
Yeah I guess I want someone who can do everything decently
Welp Lanturn just answered it for me, Illaoi and Darius are the 2 champions in League which fit all those categories perfectly.
Well I’m asking would Shen be good because I’ve heard he’s tiny does a decent amount of damage and is pre good in team fight same with Ornn
Shen is alright but no the best right now, ornn on the other hand is broken, abuse him before he gets nerfed.
